title: Gold and rainbow color styling updates with chapter editing

requirements.summary: Change all text colors to gold throughout the application, excluding status field text
acceptanceCriteria: All text elements display in gold color
Status field text retains its current color scheme
Gold color is applied consistently across all pages and components

file_operations.description: Update Tailwind CSS custom properties to set default text colors to gold (#FFD700 or equivalent OKLCH value). Apply gold to base text color while preserving existing background and other theme colors.
Extend theme configuration to include a 'gold' color token and ensure text color utilities default to gold. Preserve existing color system for backgrounds and borders.
Apply gold text color classes to all label, button text, and input elements. Ensure search input and filter labels display in gold while excluding status-specific text styling.
Apply gold color to header title text, footer text, and any other text elements. Preserve layout structure and sticky behavior.
Apply gold text color to title, chapter display, and other text elements. Exclude status field text from gold styling to preserve existing status color scheme.
Apply gold text color to form labels, input text, and dialog title. Ensure all text within the dialog displays in gold except validation messages if they require distinct colors.
Apply gold text color to form labels, input text, and dialog title, consistent with AddMangaDialog styling.
Apply gold text color to dialog title, labels, and textarea content.
Apply gold text color to dialog title, input labels, and input text for consistency with other dialogs.

requirements.summary: Change watchlist card outlines to gold color by default
acceptanceCriteria: All manga card borders/outlines display in gold color
Gold outline is visible in all states except hover

file_operations.description: Update card border/outline styling to use gold color by default. Replace existing border color classes with gold border utilities (e.g., border-gold or custom gold border color).

requirements.summary: Implement rainbow color outline for watchlist cards on hover
acceptanceCriteria: When hovering over a manga card, its outline transitions to rainbow color
Rainbow effect is smooth and visually appealing
Hover effect only applies to the currently hovered card

file_operations.description: Add hover state styling that applies a rainbow gradient border on card hover. Implement using CSS gradient or animated border effect. Ensure smooth transition from gold to rainbow on hover.
Define rainbow gradient utility classes or keyframe animations for the rainbow border effect. Use CSS custom properties or @keyframes to create a smooth, animated rainbow gradient.

requirements.summary: Change all icons throughout the application to gold color, excluding status-related icons
acceptanceCriteria: All icon elements display in gold color
Status field icons retain their current color scheme
Icons maintain proper visibility and contrast against backgrounds

file_operations.description: Apply gold color to all icon elements (bookmark, rating star, notes) except icons directly associated with status fields. Update icon className or style props to use gold color utilities.
Apply gold color to all icons in filter buttons, search input, and control elements. Update icon components to use gold color props or classes.
Apply gold color to any icons used within the login/logout button if present.
Apply gold color to expand/collapse icons in the floating controls panel.

requirements.summary: Change filter and search input text colors to gold in MangaListControls
acceptanceCriteria: Search input text displays in gold color
Filter labels and text display in gold color
Placeholder text is visible with appropriate gold shade

file_operations.description: Apply gold text color to search input value, placeholder text, and all filter label text. Use gold color utilities for input text and placeholder styling. Ensure readability with appropriate opacity for placeholders.

requirements.summary: Make the 'Incomplete' status text turn red when selected in status filters or displays
acceptanceCriteria: When 'Incomplete' status is selected or active, its text appears in red
Red color is applied specifically to the 'Incomplete' status option
Other status options maintain their default colors

file_operations.description: Add conditional styling logic to the completion status toggle that applies red text color when the incomplete/not-completed state is active. Use conditional className or inline styles to apply text-red-500 or equivalent when showing incomplete items.
Apply red text color to status display text when the manga entry has completed=false (incomplete status). Add conditional styling to show red text for incomplete entries.

requirements.summary: Fill the rating star icon with gold color
acceptanceCriteria: Star icons used for ratings are filled with solid gold color
Gold fill is visible and distinct from outline or empty state

file_operations.description: Update star icon used for rating display to be filled with gold color. Modify icon component props to use fill='currentColor' with gold text color class, or use a filled star icon variant with gold fill.

requirements.summary: Make rating numbers display in rainbow color when the rating is 8.0 or higher
acceptanceCriteria: Rating numbers >= 8.0 display in rainbow gradient color
Rating numbers < 8.0 maintain default gold color
Rainbow effect is visually clear and readable

file_operations.description: Add conditional styling logic to rating number display that applies rainbow gradient text when rating >= 8.0. Use CSS background-clip with linear-gradient for rainbow text effect or apply a rainbow text utility class. Ensure rating numbers below 8.0 display in gold.
Define rainbow text gradient utility class using background-clip: text and linear-gradient with rainbow colors. Make the class reusable for rating text and other potential rainbow text needs.

requirements.summary: Make the chapters read/chapters available display in MangaCard clickable to allow inline editing of chapter progress
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking on the chapter progress display (e.g., '5/12') makes it editable
User can update the chapters read value inline
Changes are saved to the backend when editing is completed
Visual feedback indicates the field is editable (cursor change, hover effect)
Pressing Enter or clicking outside saves the change; Escape cancels

file_operations.description: Convert chapter progress display into an editable inline component. Add onClick handler to switch to edit mode showing an input field. Implement state management for edit mode with input value binding. Add keyboard handlers for Enter (save), Escape (cancel), and blur handler to save on click-outside. Call the backend updateEntry mutation with new chaptersRead value when saving. Add visual feedback on hover (cursor pointer, underline, or highlight) to indicate editability. Preserve existing chapter formatting using formatChapterNumber utility.
